info.author: Vit Novacek
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
A proof-of-concept implementation of a novel AI theory of emergent knowledge representation and processing (i.e., meaningful automated representation and processing of noisy, possibly poorly structured knowledge coming from many resources with varyin relevance). Details of the framework are elaborated in a PhD thesis at:

http://140.203.154.209/~vit/resources/2010/pubs/phd-thesis.pdf

Developed under the auspices of Digital Enterprise Research Institute (DERI), National University of Ireland Galway (see http://www.deri.ie).
info.name: eureeka
info.summary: EUREEKA knowledge store, inference engine and scripts
